welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Avon Park, known for its tranquil lakes, friendly community, and rich history. We invite you to explore our city and experience all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Sebring Regional Airport offers services for both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Sebring Regional Airport caters to private and charter flights, providing a more personalized and exclusive experience.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Bartow Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is exclusively for private flights and offers a more luxurious and personalized experience.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's WiFi network for free by selecting 'Bartow Airport WiFi' from the available networks.
